Maybe None of the Above TRUE,since working with local authorities will help us update with the news

Seek cover and wear a K-N95 mask in case of ash falls and rock falls Avoid low lying places due to lava flows and mudflows Go near the activity in order to assess the situation None of the Above Seek cover and wear a K-N95 mask in case of ash falls and rock falls
